title: Investing in Space: The evolving market for airline Wi-Fi via satellites
summary: Satellite companies providing internet service to commercial airlines is one of the most mish-mashed sub-sectors of the space industry that I’ve come across over the years.

title: Starship Eyes Mid-March for Flight 3
summary: SpaceX has begun the final prep work for a third flight of their Starship heavy lift reusable launch vehicle, with March 14 as the currently projected liftoff date, pending approval from the Federal Aviation Administration. The mission aims to demonstrate a number of key objectives for the program, including relighting Raptor engines in space and early payload deployment functionality.

title: Daily Telescope: A brilliant shot of a comet as it nears the Sun
summary: The comet should brighten further as it nears the Sun in the coming weeks.

title: Italian space startup Kurs Orbital raises $4 million in seed funding
summary: The startup is developing a satellite interface called ARCap to enable spacecraft to dock with other vehicles

title: Iceye launches radar satellite service to monitor the high seas
summary: The new service, called Ocean Vision, pairs SAR data with computer vision techniques
